name: file-protection
description: Block writes to sensitive paths (.env, .git/, node_modules/, .next/, dist/). Part of the Solo Founder SDLC Kit.
author: fcojaviergon

hooks.command: python3 -c "import json,sys;d=json.load(sys.stdin);p=d.get('tool_input',{}).get('file_path','');sys.exit(2 if any(x in p for x in ['.env','.git/','node_modules/','.next/','dist/']) else 0)"
